text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: Pulcheria and Dounia in a cluttered room>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Pulcheria: “Rodya will be home soon!”  

Dounia: “Mother, please don’t tire yourself.”  

Pulcheria: “I must prepare! It’s been nine months!”  

---

<setup: Pulcheria excitedly cleaning, Dounia worried>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Pulcheria: “Look at this room! It’s perfect!”  

Dounia: “You need to rest, Mother.”  

Pulcheria: “No, I can’t wait to see him!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pulcheria Alexandrovna becomes increasingly anxious and ill as she prepares for her son Raskolnikov's return, reflecting her disordered imagination and emotional turmoil.
